column3:
Laura wanted to go to the park and play because she wanted to see her friends. When she
ewlinegot to the park Laura did not see anyone. After looking, she saw her friend George by the
ewlinebasketball hoop. George was playing all by himself. George was happy when he saw
ewlineLaura. Laura and George played basketball they saw the ice cream man driving in his
ewlinetruck. George asked Laura if she wanted him to buy her an ice cream cone. Laura said she
ewlinewould like him to do that. Laura sat on the bench as George walked to the ice cream
ewlinetruck. Laura looked in the sky and saw a pretty bird flying in a large circle. The bird
ewlineflew away. George came back with two ice cream cones. One of the ice cream cones had
ewlinerainbow sprinkles on it. George gave the ice cream cone with sprinkles to Laura. George and
ewlineLaura sat on the bench and watched a group of boys play football as they ate their ice
ewlinecream cones. One of the boys broke his leg. When George and Laura were finished with their
ewlineice cream, Laura ran home before the street lights came on.
column4: multiple: What sport was George playing by himself?
column9: multiple: What did the bird do in the sky?
column12: fly in a circle then fly away
column14: multiple: What did Laura see as she ate the ice cream cone?
column19: multiple: Who got the ice cream cones?
